text: I completely don't believe in astrology because it's not scientific theory. It's bullshit. Also, I a little bit hate people who believe in astrology and I think they are not smart people. Astrology based on not proven approach. Maybe the only one good thing in astrology is that astrology makes people less anxiety. I never consider any astrology stuff in my opinion.

traits.details: The text shows a strong rejection of unconventional ideas, specifically astrology, and a preference for scientific approaches, indicating a low level of openness to experience.
The text conveys confidence in one's own beliefs and opinions, with a strong tone of assertion, indicating a high level of self-efficacy.
The text demonstrates a strong willingness to express opinions and take a stance, even if it means criticizing others, indicating a high level of assertiveness.
The text shows a confrontational tone and a lack of willingness to consider alternative perspectives, indicating a low level of cooperation.
